Description: Round-topped limestone stela of Sara; representation of a dove with a cross on the head and lion-heads and plants on each side; Greek text below.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.141)
Tudor 2011 / Christian Funerary Stelae of the Byzantine and Arab Periods from Egypt
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: I.Brit.Mus.Gr. I App:6 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
